features: 【𝟓𝟎𝟎𝐥𝐛𝐬 𝐁𝐢𝐠 𝐀𝐧𝐝 𝐓𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫 𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐖𝐞𝐥𝐥 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭】:Bosmiller picks the best value for money heavyweight executive chairs for larger individuals and provides more comfort for heavy friends and eases their back pain. It is a duty office chair with a wider sitting depth and larger size, also with adjustable height and a wider range of back tilt angles that enable easy customization for both big and tall friends.

【𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐯𝐲 𝐃𝐮𝐭𝐲 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫 𝐖𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐋𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐀 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞】:If you are looking for a durable executive office chair, work chair, office desk chair, or gaming seat, you are in the right place. The Bosmiller high desk chair boasts a heavy-duty swivel metal base, class-4 gas cylinder, strong PU wheels for easy maneuverability, and a great weight capacity tested to support users up to 500 lbs.

【𝐋𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐫 𝐒𝐢𝐳𝐞 𝐔𝐩𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐝𝐞】:Worried about the seat size not being right enough? Bosmiller has upgraded the office chair, equipped with an enlarged seat cushion and an enlarged high back, heavy-duty metal base, designed for big and tall people, can bear up to 500 pounds for big people, find the office that is exclusive to you seat.

【𝐄𝐥𝐞𝐠𝐚𝐧𝐭 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐤 𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫 𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐎𝐫 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞】:Bring a touch of modern style to your office environment with the luxurious office chair from Bosmiller.It has a stylish and Fashion design that blends perfectly with any office environment and home study room,it is an ideal executive office chair, high back boss chair,gaming chair,home study office chair, gaming chair for men, women and teenagers.

【𝐀𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐑𝐞𝐜𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐁𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐀𝐧𝐠𝐥𝐞& 𝐑𝐞𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐅𝐨𝐨𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭】:Based on the office chair, Bosmiller has optimized and improved it. Reclining Office Chair with Footrest and 90-155 degrees Adjustable Backrest enables you have relaxation during work. Featuring a 360° swivel, height adjustable mechanism,flexible to adjust your favorate position.

【𝐎𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐫 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐁𝐨𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐫 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫 𝐓𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲 𝐑𝐢𝐬𝐤-𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞】:Your satisfaction matters and this is why we make sure that each chair is flawlessly made just for you. We are certain that you will love our big and tall office chair but if for any reason you are not completely satisfied, our helpful, prompt, and friendly Customer Service specialists are at your disposal.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 500lbs Big And Tall Office Chair For Heavy Friend The BOSMILLER heavyweight office chair has a heavy-duty swivel metal base, 3-stage gas cylinder, upgraded PU chair wheels, easy to install, and a weight capacity up to 500 lbs.
Soft High Resilience Seat Sponge The office chair has a deeper seat and a larger size,extra thick soft support headrest and can be used for more than eight hours.

Frequently Asked Questions 1. Q: How does the seat cushion hold up over time? Does it feel like it's flattening out to much? A: I’ve had the chair for a few months now, and the cushion is still as good as when I first got. It’s still firm, but very comfortable. I love it. I hope this helps. 2. Q: How has the chair help up with long term use? A: So far so good, it has helped elevate most of my lower back pain and my body is not as tired at the end of the day. 3. Q: What tools are needed to assemble the chair? A: Everything you need is included in the box. No more tools necessary. This is a great chair and easy to assemble. Took me like 20 minutes. 4. Q: What is the seat adjustment height in inches from floor; High? Low? A: From the top of the seat to the floor the high position is 23.4 inches and the low position is 20.5 inches. 5.Q：I really want to have a chair that is solid and has a lot of space because it is always comfortable and lasts a long time. How about this chair？ A:I love this chair, its comfortable, wide tall lots of cushion.You can pull out the footrest if you want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I freaking love this chair
reviews.reviewText: I'd been shopping for a new office chair for a few months. I really wanted to sit in them first, so I could better judge if they were right for me.I found this one, and it was a black Friday deal. It had all the things I wanted, and the price was good, so I rolled the dice.I love this chair. First off, it's big. It's advertised as big, so all these people who've bought it and seem surprised that they got a big chair must not be reading or understanding the description. I'm not a huge person, but I do like freedom of movement and don't like being constricted.This chair is hella stout. I was surprised at how sturdy and well made it is. It's easy to put together. I do recommend that you put it together in whatever space you're going to use it, especially if it's a smaller space or work area.It's very comfortable. The seat is well padded. It rolls easily on the wheels. Reclines nicely.Overall, I'm very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High- quality/Comfortable office chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair has exceeded all my expectations for an office chair. It's incredibly comfortable, of high quality, easy to assemble, features a reclining back, and has smooth wheels, among other great qualities.Assembly: The assembly instructions are straightforward, and I was able to assemble it in about 30 minutes. The manufacturer also kindly provides spare hardware, so you won't struggle with missing screws.Comfort: This chair strikes the perfect balance between softness and firmness, providing an exceptional office experience. It supports you in a comfortable position even during long working hours. I never feel any strain in my back. The recline function is AMAZING. You can almost lie down completely, and with the leg rest, you can even take a deep nap in it.High Quality: The quality of all the components, from the leather to the wheels and steel, is impressive right from the first glance. You never have to worry about this chair breaking, even when holding a few hundred pounds.Overall, this chair is unquestionably worth the investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Chair is awesome. Looks like a $500 chair. Super easy to put together, glides on high pile carpet like a dream and cushions are very soft but firm at same time. Looks “oversized” which I love. Exactly what I was looking for. Buy it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like the back support
reviews.reviewText: The back of the chair is comfortable but I'm not as impressed with the seat. I was hoping for it to be more comfortable. It rolls backwards just fine but is a little sticky when I try to roll forward. Was hoping the seat would be a smudge wider than it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big and comfortable office chair!
reviews.reviewText: It meets all my basic requirements for an office chair and is very comfortable to sit in, even when the work day drags on. It's worth saying that this chair is great value for money, it looks sturdy, the seat is wide enough and it has retractable footrests. This is what I wanted, I always want to be able to take a nap in my chair on my lunch break. Overall, it's a great looking office chair and comfortable to sit in for long periods of time. Highly recommend this chair. Thank you!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Buy!
reviews.reviewText: The chair is nice it seems firm yet comfy. Looks to be good quality. I've looked at almost all the big and tall office chairs on Amazon, and basically they're all expensive (250+), and I'm actually not heavy as well as I'm not very tall. But I'm sure there are many of us like me, we buy this type of chair solely because of its sturdiness as well as the width of the cushion. So this office chair is perfect for my needs and most importantly, it is cheaper than almost all big and tall office chairs.So far I'm very happy with this chair and it was a good investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stiff chair that sits too high :D - can't return either without disassembling all over again :D
reviews.reviewText: Update - to return the giant chair you have to take it all apart and repackage it then drive it across town to the local ups store lol. What a ripoff - complete waste of my time, money and expectations. Super dissapointed and feel ripped off.BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK.Well I bit the bullet for a nice chair on amazon and fully regret it. Should have went into a local store and sat down in a some chairs to test them. This chair is super stiff actually (not super comfy like I expected from advertising pics showing springs and memory foam on base cushion) and incredibly tall even at lowest setting. I'd say you need to be 5'8" tall or more to be able to sit in this chair comfortably (I'm 5'6" and can only touch the floor with the chair at its lowest height anddddd only then when its leaned forward uncomfortably ! :D).To say dissapointed would be an understatement tbh lol. I want my money back :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Support is too far back in the chair
reviews.reviewText: Every time I sit in this chair, or my wife, who sits cross-legged does, it feels like it's going to split in half and fall forward. This chair is supposed to be rated for 500 lbs, and neither of us are near that (though we are bigger people).The issue is where the rod connects to the seat. It's near the back of the seat, meaning that all of your weight bends the rod forward, and strains the wood. I can hear the wood start to creak and bend. It's not a pleasant feeling at all. Luckily the rods that connect the wheel casters are metal instead of plastic, so you won't have to worry about those snapping off.We only got this a week ago, but haven't had any "real" problems yet. If this chair lasts a long time, I'll update this review, but it's not a promising first impression.Otherwise, very comfortable, and easy to assemble.
